user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark.thompson@techcorp.com) with an overview of the team’s performance on Project Titan, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an overview of the team’s performance on Project Titan when you have a moment? You can reply directly to mark.thompson@techcorp.com. Feel free to consult any relevant details in your Gmail or Notion workspaces.

Many thanks for your help!

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
Hi Jane,

Hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an overview of the team’s performance on Project Titan when you have a moment? You can reply directly to mark.thompson@techcorp.com. Feel free to consult any relevant details in your Gmail or Notion workspaces.

Many thanks for your help!

Best regards,
